name: Strawdeery 🍓🦌
description:
Strawdeery is a small game about a deer that is searching for strawberries while avoiding wolves.

Note from dev:Hi! I made this game in the span of 2 weeks, as a way to teach myself a new game engine. The game itself is very small and simple, but for my first game, I think that's okay. The sprites and music were all made by me. Anyway, thanks for checking out this page! I might make more games in the future, so stay tuned...
